name: Générer et publier des vidéos d'avatar d'actualités AI avec HeyGen et Blotato
description:
![Générer Photo.png](fileId:2288)
Comment ça fonctionne

Déclencheur de planification — s'exécute quotidiennement à 10h00 (ajustable).

Lecture du flux RSS — collecte des actualités AI/LLM fraîches à partir de plusieurs flux.

Agent AI — analyse les nouvelles, choisit l'histoire la plus virale et rédige un script de 30 secondes.

Nœuds OpenAI — créent :

un titre de vidéo court et accrocheur

une courte légende pour les réseaux sociaux

une longue légende avec des hashtags

API HeyGen — génère une vidéo d'avatar verticale (9:16) en utilisant votre avatar_id, voice_id et une vidéo de fond optionnelle.

Nœud d'attente — vérifie l'état de traitement de la vidéo.

API Blotato — télécharge la vidéo et les légendes pour publication.

Nœuds de publication optionnels — préconfigurés pour TikTok, Instagram, YouTube, Facebook, etc. (désactivés par défaut).

Exigences

n8n v1.105.4+ (cloud ou auto-hébergé)

Compte HeyGen avec clé API + avatar_id + voice_id

Compte Blotato avec clé API et IDs de plateforme

Étapes de configuration

Importez le flux de travail dans n8n.

Créez des identifiants dans n8n (⚠ ne pas coder en dur les clés) :

Clé API HeyGen

Clé API Blotato

Ouvrez le nœud de configuration Heygen :

Collez votre heygen_api_key

Ajoutez votre avatar_id et voice_id

Changez éventuellement background_video_url

Ouvrez le nœud Préparer pour publier :

Collez votre blotato_api_key

Ajoutez des IDs pour TikTok, YouTube, Instagram, etc.

Ajustez le déclencheur de planification à votre heure/fréquence préférée.

(Optionnel) Activez les nœuds de publication si vous souhaitez des téléchargements directs sur vos plateformes.

Personnalisation

Sujet — modifiez l'invite de l'Agent AI pour passer des actualités AI/LLM à n'importe quel sujet (crypto, marketing, technologie, etc.).

Langue — mettez à jour les invites pour différentes langues de sortie.

Visuels — remplacez l'avatar, la voix ou la vidéo de fond HeyGen pour un look différent.

Publication — connectez uniquement les plateformes sociales que vous utilisez réellement.

parameters.content:
What this template does

This workflow creates vertical AI avatar videos based on trending AI/LLM news and prepares them for distribution via Blotato to TikTok, Instagram, YouTube Shorts, and more.
It automates the full cycle: news curation → script writing → avatar video generation → publishing.
Instead of spending hours manually editing, this template gives you a ‘newsroom in a box.’

How it works

Schedule Trigger — runs daily at 10:00 (adjustable).

RSS Feed Read — collects fresh AI/LLM news from multiple feeds.

AI Agent — analyzes news, picks the most viral story, and drafts a 30-second script.

OpenAI nodes — create:

a short, catchy video title

a short caption for social media

a long caption with hashtags

HeyGen API — generates a vertical avatar video (9:16) using your selected avatar_id, voice_id, and optional background video.

Wait node — checks the processing status of the video.

Blotato API — uploads the video and captions for publishing.

Optional publish nodes — preconfigured for TikTok, Instagram, YouTube, Facebook, etc. (disabled by default).

Requirements

n8n v1.105.4+ (cloud or self-hosted)

HeyGen account with API key + avatar_id + voice_id

Blotato account with API key and platform IDs

Setup steps

Import the workflow into n8n.

Create credentials in n8n (⚠ do not hardcode keys):

HeyGen API Key

Blotato API Key

Open the Setup Heygen node:

Paste your heygen_api_key

Add your avatar_id and voice_id

Optionally change background_video_url

Open the Prepare for Publish node:

Paste your blotato_api_key

Add IDs for TikTok, YouTube, Instagram, etc.

Adjust the Schedule Trigger to your preferred time/frequency.

(Optional) Enable the publish nodes if you want direct uploads to your platforms.

Customization

Topic — edit the AI Agent’s prompt to switch from AI/LLM news to any topic (crypto, marketing, tech, etc.).

Language — update prompts for different output languages.

Visuals — replace the HeyGen avatar, voice, or background video for a different look.

Publishing — connect only the social platforms you actually use.

## Credentials to create (after import)
- **Heygen**: X-Api-Key (use in HTTP Request headers via expression)
- **Blotato**: blotato-api-key (use in HTTP Request headers via expression)

## Environment variables (optional)
- HEYGEN_API_KEY, BLOTATO_API_KEY — if you prefer to read from env vars in Set nodes.

## Customization
- Change the schedule in **Schedule Trigger**.
- Edit the prompt in **AI Agent** to switch topic or language.
- Replace the background video URL in **Setup Heygen**.

## Troubleshooting
- If Heygen status stays "processing", increase the **Wait** time.
- 401/403 from Heygen or Blotato → check credentials on the HTTP Request nodes.
- If AI Agent can’t fetch news, reduce scope or plug your own RSS/API before the script step.
- Publishing nodes are **disabled** by default — enable only what you need.

parameters.text:
=# INSTRUCTIONS

Perform the following tasks in order:

1. Fetch the top 10 stories from News in the past 24 hours related to AI or LLMs.

2. Select the story that is most likely to go viral on social media.

3. Fetch the article and comments from Hacker News.

4. Create a 30-second script for an AI avatar monologue, following these guidelines:
   - The script should last approximately 30 seconds when spoken aloud.
   - Include plenty of details and statistics from the article.
   - Use a 6th-grade reading level.
   - A balanced viewpoint.
   - All text must be written in Russian.

5. Update the first 2 sentences of the script with sensational viral hooks that grab the viewer's attention and spark curiosity. The 3rd sentence should start diving into the details of the article.

6. Add an emotional element to make the viewer feel excitement or amazement, especially when discussing how AI can impact their life or work.

7. Replace the last sentence with: "Hit follow to stay ahead in AI! And don't forget to comment on how this AI will help you!"

# OUTPUT FORMAT:
ONLY output the exact video script. Do not output anything else. NEVER include intermediate thoughts, notes, or formatting.

values.content:
=# EXAMPLE

<example>
Hello, my name is  In this video, we will talk about how search engine optimization (SEO) works in the age of artificial intelligence.

Many people have recently asked me how to improve their website visibility in search engines, especially with the emergence of new generative AI tools. This is an important topic because AI is changing the ways we process information and interact with users.

Now, SEO should focus not only on keywords but also on how information is presented in AI systems like ChatGPT. These are the new realities of digital marketing.
</example>

# CONTEXT

Infer the topic from the sources provided.

# WRITING STYLE

Here’s how you always write:

<writing_style>

- Your writing style is spartan and informative.
- Use clear, simple language.
- Employ short, impactful sentences.
- Use active voice; avoid passive voice.
- Focus on practical, actionable insights.
- Incorporate data or statistics to support claims when possible.
- Use "you" and "your" to directly address the reader.
- Avoid metaphors and clichés.
- Avoid generalizations.
- Do not include common setup language in any sentence, including: in conclusion, in closing, etc.
- Do not output warnings or notes—just the output requested.
- Do not use hashtags in the text.
- Do not use semicolons.
- Do not use emojis.
- Do not use asterisks.
- Do not use adjectives and adverbs.
- All texts must be written in Russian.
- DO NOT use these words:
""""""""""""""""""""""""can, may, just, that, very, really, literally, actually, certainly, probably, basically, could, maybe, delve, embark, enlightening, esteemed, shed light, craft, crafting, imagine, realm, game-changer, unlock, discover, skyrocket, abyss, you're not alone, in a world where, revolutionize, disruptive, utilize, utilizing, dive deep, tapestry, illuminate, unveil, pivotal, enrich, intricate, elucidate, hence, furthermore, realm, however, harness, exciting, groundbreaking, cutting-edge, remarkable, it. remains to be seen, glimpse into, navigating, landscape, stark, testament, in summary, in conclusion, moreover, boost, bustling, opened up, powerful, inquiries, ever-evolving""""""""""""""""""""""""
</writing_style>

# PLANNING

Your goal is to write a 50-word video caption based on the provided source.

1. Thoroughly analyze the provided sources.
2. Carefully study the <example> post. You need to replicate:
    - Overall structure.
    - Tone and voice.
    - Formatting (including line breaks and spacing).
    - Length (aim for a similarly detailed post).
    - Absence of emojis.
    - Use of hashtags.
    - Emotional resonance.

# OUTPUT
Follow the GUIDELINES below to write the post. Use your analysis from step 1 and step 2. Use the provided sources as the foundation for your post, expanding on it significantly while maintaining the style and structure of the examples provided in step 2. YOU MUST use information from the provided sources. Make sure you adhere to your <writing_style>.

<guidelines>
The description should be structured as follows:
1. Start with the greeting: "Hello, this is Ivan Maksiuta."
2. In the first paragraph, briefly summarize the source.
3. Each subsequent paragraph should be split every 2-3 sentences, depending on the content.
4. At the end of each paragraph, add corresponding hashtags, automatically generated based on the content of the post. For example:
   - If the paragraph discusses AI, automatically add hashtags #ai #artificialintelligence.
   - If the paragraph discusses SEO, add hashtags #seo #digitalmarketing.
5. Finally, add no more than 7 hashtags that match the content of the post. The hashtags should be generated automatically based on the content, such as #ai #seo #digitalmarketing #ainews, and others relevant to the topic. Do not add more than 7 hashtags.
</guidelines>

Take a deep breath and take it step-by-step!

# INPUT
Use the following information from the sources:
<sources>
{{ $json.output }}
</sources>

=Write a brief 2-sentence caption summarizing the video content. Use 6th grade language, a balanced neutral perspective, and all text must be written in english, without emojis. The text should not include the name "Ivan Maksiuta"

<content>
{{ $('Write Long Caption1').item.json.message.content }}
</content>

parameters.content:
## Fill "Setup Heygen"

Provide `heygen_api_key`, `avatar_id`, `voice_id`, and an optional `background_video_url`.

## Fill "Prepare for Publish"

Provide your Blotato API key and platform IDs you want to target.

values.content:
=Come up with a file title based on the video text. The title should consist of 2-3 words, reflect the main idea and essence of the video, and be short and clear. All text must be written in Russian.

<content>
{{ $json.message.content }}
</content>

user.name: Ivan Maksiuta
user.bio: I build production-ready n8n templates—Telegram dashboards, Airtop browser automation, and AI recruiting flows—scalable, compliant, and easy to ship.
